attributes.action: Demand that Andy Hornby is removed as CEO of Boots
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Andy Hornby has been responsible for the destruction of one of the finest institutions in the country. He is also indirectly responsible for putting many thousands of people on the dole and for the destruction of LLoyds TSB shareholder value. Many thousands of people will now find themselves in serious financial difficulty except Andy Hornby who has now picked up a job at Boots paying one million pounds a year plus big bonuses!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
